creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
We need to roll 1.5 out the door.  In order to accomplish this, lets sync the
documentation up to teh current state of the code for all modules and roll this
puppy out.  Then we can proceed with the more drastic of 2.0 changes.

creator: glens@apache.org
text:
Updated.  If there any further issues you wish to specifically address before 
1.5 please raise a new bug.  -- GJS
ummm....so its done for HSSF...is it done for POIFS et al?
creator: poi-support@buni.org

text:
POIFs has a comment saying that other documentation needs to be converted over 
to XML format.  Marc says this is just out of date design documents and we 
agreed it need not be a showstopper for 1.5.  I have reviewed the rest of the 
documentation and I'm happy with it.  Given my limited knowledge of the other 
subprojects there may be some deeper wholes but from what I read and understood 
I'm happy to go with it.

I will remove the comment from PoiFS overview.
creator: glens@apache.org
